answers.answer: Hello,Every birth control method has its own advantages and disadvantages. It can act differently in each woman. Hormonal fluctuations caused by Implanon can cause nausea, night sweats etc.It is important to rule out other causes of night sweats like diabetes, hypo/hypertension, thyroid or other endocrine disturbances etc. Night sweats can also point to a cardiac etiology. It is best to get a complete check up done by your physician.Take care and regards!
